text:
e="preserve">Nick Mourouzis (April 16, 1937 – September 16, 2020) was an American football player and coach. He was the head football coach at DePauw University in Greencastle, Indiana from 1981 to 2003. He had a winning record of 133–82–4. As a college football player, Mourouzis was a starting quarterback at Miami University in Oxford, Ohio. Mourouzis was born in New Philadelphia, Ohio.
Mourouzis died on September 16, 2020 from COVID-19 in Greencastle, Indiana at the age of 83.
